duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather information from plans, specifications, and other sources to develop a detailed cost estimate.
Develop a cost estimate that includes all direct and indirect costs, as well as contingencies.
Make effective decisions when presented with obstacles during a project to successfully bring a project to completion.
Communicate with multiple departments keeping projects on time and within budgetary constraints.
Work with the project team to develop cost-saving measures if Value Engineered (VE) options are required.
Communicate with the Sales Rep and/or customer throughout the progress of the project and identify and overcome potential roadblocks to avoid project hiccups.
Ensure that the project order meets the client’s requirements.
